entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
